text: Tara jaba allahale tiniharula'i baca'idincha taba tiniharule turuntai prthvima tyasai ghrstatapurvaka upadrava garna thalchan. Manisaharu ho! Timro yo uddandata timro lagi nai hanikaraka hunecha. Sansarika jivanaka kehi pha'ida chan tara pheri timile hamrai samipama pharkera a'unu parnecha ani hamile timila'i timile gareko sabai dekha'une chaum
